TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProviderCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of provider objects that inherit from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The ProviderCollection class utilizes an underlying <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> object to store the provider name/value pairs.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The ProviderCollection constructor initializes the underlying <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> object used to store the items of the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Add(class System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase provider) cil managed

Docs.summary: Adds a provider to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Add method first checks for any exceptions (as listed in the Exceptions section), and then calls the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method. It passes in the object referenced by the `provider` parameter as well as the <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name%2A> property of the provider to be used as the key in the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> object.

Docs.exception:
The <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name%2A> of is .
\- or -
The length of the <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name%2A> of is less than 1.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Clear() cil managed

Docs.summary: Removes all items from the collection.
Docs.exception: The collection is set to read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase[] array, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(class System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase[] array, int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: The array to copy the elements of the collection to.
The index of the collection item at which to start the copying process.
Docs.summary: Copies the contents of the collection to the given array starting at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The array into which the items are copied must have zero-based indexing.

Docs.summary: Gets the number of providers in the collection.
Docs.value: The number of providers in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection> class stores its collection in a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> object. The GetEnumerator method calls the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe).

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property is included to fulfill the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.

Docs.param: The key by which the provider is identified.
Docs.summary: Gets the provider with the specified name.
Docs.value: The provider with the specified name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the provider to be removed.
Docs.summary: Removes a provider from the collection.
Docs.exception: The collection has been set to read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetReadOnly() cil managed

Docs.summary: Sets the collection to be read-only.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection> class is read/write by default. The SetReadOnly method makes the collection read-only. After a collection is set to read-only, some method calls (such as <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection.Remove%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection.Add%2A> will result in an exception.
Note that most provider-based features will set their <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection> object to read-only after creating instances of all of the configured providers.
## Remarks This property is included to fulfill the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(class System.Array array, int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: The array to copy the elements of the collection to.
The index of the array at which to start copying provider instances from the collection.
Docs.summary: Copies the elements of the to an array, starting at a particular array index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the ICollection.CopyTo instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
